title: Drophacking?
body: Alright i am mad. I entered a game and some fuck wit decided to start drop hacking. Legit at 29 mins their graves has 300 cs and is going 9/3 or some shit like that.During this game everyone was disconnecting and all types of shit and while we were dcing the graves was farming with ease and killing. The game ends while ive dc'd on 329ping and i lose a game without a loss prevented. And no this wasnt my internet because 9 people dced through the whole game. RITO HALP

replies.body: My ign is The godfather im on OCE and it was my thresh game
No, it's not us doing it -_-, like i've said on the other posts, we have nothing to do with these drop hacking things. It's not us doing it.

I had the same dcs in my game just then my great lord, was trashing top with riven then boom everyone starts dcing bar like 1 guy on enemy team and they get inhib and I guess super minions killed our base or they did cuz I waited 5 minutes and then the game was over and did not reconnect once.
what's ur ID, cause im vsing this guy (Dirty Debbie) and i think he's using drop hacking.
